1.0.name: wordpress/simple-light-box
1.0.description:
Simple Light Box is the simple jquery effect to show a image in lightbox. This is THE perfect tool to manage perfectly your WP terms for any taxonomy

It was written with this philosophy : best performances, more secured and brings a lot of new functions

This plugin is developped on WordPress 3.3, with the constant WP_DEBUG to TRUE.

  • Administration

    • Easy configuration ! (in WP admin)

And more...
